00019 #ifndef _IPL98_STATISTIC_H
00020 #define _IPL98_STATISTIC_H
00021 
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include "../float_image.h"
00024 #include "../pixelgroup.h"
00025 #include "../../kernel_c/algorithms/kernel_statistic.h"
00026 
00027 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00028 
00029 using std::vector;
00030 
00039 class CStatistic{
00040         private: // attributes
00041                 TStatistic m_Statistic;
00042                 bool m_StatisticsDerived;
00043         public: // methods
00045                 CStatistic();
00047                 ~CStatistic();
00051                 double GetMean() const;
00055                 double GetMin() const;
00059                 double GetMax() const;
00063                 double GetStdDev() const;
00069                 unsigned int GetSizeOfHistogram() const;
00078                 UINT32* GetHistogramPtr();
00082                 bool DeriveStats(const CFloatImage& Image);
00086                 bool DeriveStats(const CIntImage& Image);
00092                 bool DeriveStats(const CStdImage& Image);
00097                 bool DeriveStats(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup);
00103                 template<class POLY> bool DeriveStats(const vector<POLY>& Values)
00104                 {
00105                         unsigned int TotalValues=Values.size();
00106                         if (TotalValues==0)
00107                         {
00108                                 ostringstream ost;
00109                                 ost << "CStatistic::DeriveStats(vector<T>) No values in given vector" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00110                                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00111                                 return false;
00112                         }
00113                         else
00114                         {
00115                                 POLY Value;
00116                                 double Sum=0.0;
00117                                 double Sum2=0.0;
00118                                 std::vector<POLY>::const_iterator it=Values.begin();
00119                                 m_Statistic.SizeOfHistogram=0; /* no histogram */
00120                                 m_Statistic.Min=m_Statistic.Max=*it; /* init min and max */
00121                                 while(it!=Values.end())
00122                                 {
00123                                         Value=*it++;
00124                                         if (Value<m_Statistic.Min) m_Statistic.Min=Value;
00125                                         else if (Value>m_Statistic.Max) m_Statistic.Max=Value;
00126                                         Sum+=Value;
00127                                         Sum2+=Value*Value;
00128                                 }
00129                                 m_Statistic.Mean=Sum/TotalValues;
00130                                 m_Statistic.StdDev=sqrt(Sum2/TotalValues-m_Statistic.Mean*m_Statistic.Mean);
00131                                 m_StatisticsDerived=true;
00132                                 return true;
00133                         }
00134                 }
00135 
00141                 friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& s,const CStatistic& Img);
00143 };
00144 
00148 
00149 }
00150 
00151 #endif //_IPL98_STATISTIC_H
